data.message: How do I report the coward behind this page for hacking my personal page then reposting my personal things on other pages?  Not to mention the stalking and harassment that Facebook seem to ignore no matter how much it is reported.  https://www.facebook.com/truth2powercommunity

replies.message: We hear your frustrations, Skip. It sounds like your personal account or a fellow Page admin's account was hacked. We can help you secure them here: http://on.fb.me/1Dpe4oH. -Rose

That doesn't solve the problem of the person hacking my account.  I am sick and tired of their constant harassment, bullying, belittling, and no to ice the cake hacking my personal page while hiding behind a "community" page.  You people take down pages that have no reason to be taken down regularly, yet you refuse to do anything about someone who hacked my account and then posted my information.  I have the screenshot of that fake page posting my information that is only visible to friends.
